news.title: Nothing opens its first retail store in India
news.summary: The two-story location will sell products from Nothing and the more affordable, mass-market brand CMF.

news.title: Indian pharmacy chain giant exposed customer data and internal systems
news.summary: A backend flaw in web admin dashboards used by one of India's largest pharmacy chains, exposed thousands of online pharmacy orders.

news.title: Airbnb plans to bake in AI features for search, discovery and support
news.summary: Airbnb CEO Brian Chesky said the company wants to increase its use of large language models for customer discovery, support and engineering.

news.title: Airbnb says a third of its customer support is now handled by AI in the US and Canada
news.summary: Airbnb was poised to introduce an app that doesn't just search for you, but one that "knows you." CEO Brian Chesky said, "It will help guests plan their entire trip, help hosts better run their businesses, and help the company operate more efficiently at scale."

news.title: Fintech lending giant Figure confirms data breach
news.summary: The company said hackers downloaded “a limited number of files” after breaking into an employee’s account. The hacking group ShinyHunters took responsibility for the breach.

news.title: 4chan’s creator says ‘Epstein had nothing to do’ with creating infamous far-right board /pol/
news.summary: The close timing of Jeffrey Epstein coming into contact with 4chan founder Chris 'moot' Poole and the launch of the "politically incorrect" message board /pol/ that became a breeding ground for QAnon and the white supremacist alt-right movement was coincidental, says Poole. news.title: Steam beta lets users add their PC specs to reviews
news.summary: User reviews on Steam may get more informative after a Steam Client Beta update released on Thursday, which adds an option for users to attach their hardware specs to game reviews. news.title: Show HN: SQL-tap – Real-time SQL traffic viewer for PostgreSQL and MySQL
news.summary:
sql-tap is a transparent proxy that captures SQL queries by parsing the PostgreSQL/MySQL wire protocol and displays them in a terminal UI. You can run EXPLAIN on any captured query. No application code changes needed — just change the port.

news.title: OpenAI Is Nuking Its 4o Model. China’s ChatGPT Fans Aren’t OK
news.summary: As OpenAI removed access to GPT-4o in its app on Friday, people who have come to rely on the chatbot for companionship are mourning the loss all over the world.

news.title: Social Security Workers Are Being Told to Hand Over Appointment Details to ICE
news.summary: The recent request goes against decades of precedent and puts noncitizens at further risk of immigration enforcement actions.

news.title: Senators Urge Top Regulator to Stay Out of Prediction Market Lawsuits
news.summary: As prediction market platforms like Polymarket and Kalshi battle regulators in court, Senate Democrats are urging the CFTC to avoid weighing in, escalating a broader fight over the burgeoning industry.
